question: Which functions below are likely to be pure?

options.answer: output of the function depends on a global value
output of a function depends only on the time of day
function writes 'True' to a database then returns the exact same input
function reads input from database then always returns True
output of the function depends on a configuration parameter that can be changed at run-time.
output of the function depends on running the input through a complex calculation
input is always an integer, output of the function is that number plus a pseudorandom number
input of the function is a pseudorandom number, output is that number squared
